p:
Territory of Washington Spokane County}ss. Before W.J. Harber Justice of the Peace Cheney precinct
Territory of Washington against Willis D. Coyle Deft. Territory of Washington County of Spokane
T.D. Boggs of said county and Territory being duly sworn on this oath says that in Spokane County Washington Territory on the 4th day of April A.D. 1885 the said defendant W.D. Coyle unlawfully and feloniously upon one Charles Seaman then and there being did make an assault and with a certain deadly weapon that is to say an inspection called steel knuckles being and held, did feloniously unlawfully assault. That and wound with intent then and there on the part of him the said W.D. Coyle to intent upon the person of the said Charled Seaman a bodily injury. No cause or able provocation appearing for said assault showing then and there on the part of him the said W.D. Coyle a wilful malignant and abandoned heart. T.D. Boggs
